panels.description: Número total de consultas recebidas no intervalo de tempo selecionado.
panels.title: Consultas

panels.description: Número total de consultas que foram recusadas ou descartadas porque falharam nas configurações de controle de acesso no intervalo de tempo selecionado.
panels.title: Consultas indesejadas

panels.description: Número total de respostas indesejadas ou não solicitadas no intervalo de tempo selecionado. Um aumento acentuado no tráfego indesejado indica uma possível execução de falsificação em andamento.
panels.title: Respostas indesejadas

panels.description: Memória máxima em uso pelos caches no intervalo de tempo selecionado
panels.title: Tamanho do cache de memória

panels.description: The number of threads created to serve clients
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: Tempo de resposta da consulta em segundos
panels.title: Tempo de resposta

panels.description: Total number of queries that were made using TCP towards the Unbound server at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas TCP recebidas

panels.description: Total number of queries that were made using TCP towards the Unbound server  at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas TCP de saída

panels.description: Total number of queries that had been rate limited at the selected time range.
panels.title: Taxa de consultas limitadas

panels.description: Total number of queries that were made using TLS towards the Unbound server at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas TLS recebidas

panels.description: Total number of queries that were made using TLS resumption at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas de retomada de TLS

panels.description: Total number of queries that were made using IPv6 towards the Unbound server at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas IPv6

panels.description: Total amount of answers that were secure (AD) at the selected time range.
panels.title: Respostas seguras

panels.description: Total amount of answers that were bogus (withheld as SERVFAIL) at the selected time range.
panels.title: Respostas falsas

panels.description: Total number of queries that had an EDNS OPT record present at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas EDNS OPT

panels.description: Total number of queries that had an EDNS OPT record with the DO (DNSSEC OK) bit set present at the selected time range.
panels.title: Consultas EDNS OPT + DNSSEC OK

panels.description: Número total de consultas com um determinado tipo de consulta
panels.title: Total de consultas por tipo

panels.description: Total number of answers by rcode
panels.title: Total de respostas por rcode

panels.description: Total number of queries that had a given flag set in the header
panels.title: Total de consultas por sinalizador

panels.description: Total number of queries with a given query opcode
panels.title: Total de consultas por opcode

panels.description: Total number of queries with a given query class
panels.title: Total de consultas por turma

panels.description: Total number of queries handled by each worker thread
panels.title: Total de consultas por thread

panels.description: Total number of cache prefetches performed
panels.title: Total de pré-buscas de cache por thread

panels.description: Total number of replies with ttl zero, because they served an expired cache entry.
panels.title: Total replies with zero TTL by thread

panels.description: Number of the currently held TCP buffers for incoming connections
panels.title: Total held TCP buffers by thread

panels.description: Current size of the request list, including internally generated queries
panels.title: Solicitar tamanho da lista

panels.description: Number of queries that were dropped because the request list was full
panels.title: Total exceeded queries

panels.description: Total number of requests in the request list that were overwritten by newer entries
panels.title: Total overwritten queries

panels.description: Total number of queries that were encrypted and successfully decapsulated by dnscrypt
panels.title: Total successful queries

panels.description: Total number of queries that were requesting dnscrypt certificates
panels.title: Total certificate requesting queries

panels.description: Total number of queries received on dnscrypt port that were cleartext and not a request for certificates
panels.title: Total received cleartext queries

panels.description: Total number of requests that were neither cleartext, not valid dnscrypt messages
panels.title: Total malformed queries

panels.description:
Hits: total number of queries that were successfully answered using a cache lookup.

Misses: total number of cache queries that needed recursive processing
panels.title: Cache hits / misses

panels.description: Memory in bytes by caches
panels.title: Cache size

panels.description: The number of cached entries
panels.title: Cached entries

panels.description: Memory in use by modules
panels.title: Modules size

panels.description: The number of bytes in the stream wait buffers
panels.title: Stream wait buffers size
